Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] fotoconnection.com-SONY TV-EV Letterhead ISP Letter Template]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] fotoconnection.com-SONY TV-EV Letterhead ISP Letter
Template
Date:         Tue, 16 May 2006 08:49:25 -0400
From:         Jayme <jayme@netenforcers.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



DMCA Notification/fotoconnection.com/SONY TV
- ------------------------------------------------------------------------

/Phoenix// Office:/


      Ellis & Venable

101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875


      Phoenix, Arizona 85003

        

/voice: /(602) 631-9393

/fax: /(602) 631-9796



*May 16, 2006*

        




        *7006 0100 0002 0710 2585*



*VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL*

*RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED*



*George Poletes*

*1333 Stemmons Pwy., Ste. 110, *

*Dallas**, TX 75207***

* *

*/Re:      Unauthorized Use of SONY TELEVISION?S Trademarks and/or
Copyrighted Materials/*

/ /

Dear Designated Agent:



We have been retained by our Sony Television, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you
with respect to unauthorized use of Sony?s trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.



SONY TELEVISION has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and
enforcement of its rights in SONY TELEVISION-owned or licensed trademarks, logos,
and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist
with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
